articles.title: AirPods Pro are back down to their lowest price at Woot - The Verge
articles.description: Woot is hosting a good discount on Apple’s AirPods Pro wireless earbuds. Normally $200 at other retailers, they’re $190. You can also get $10 off the lowest price yet on the new iPad Air and half off the Razer DeathAdder Essential.
